dc:title: On Pilgrimage - September 1965
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Grouses about plumbing problems, landlord issues, and needing money for a better house of hospitality. Says we need to do penance for the war in Vietnam, using all our life force. Discourses on love, sex, chastity, purity in relation to God and penance.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 830 1965-09-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
